Title: Marius and Jeannette
Writer: Jean-Louis Milesi (scenario and dialogue), Robert Guédiguian (scenario and dialogue)
Actors: Ariane Ascaride, Gérard Meylan, Pascale Roberts, Jacques Boudet
Plot: Marius is the keeper of an abandoned cement works staying high above the quarter of l'Estaque in Marseilles. Jeannette is bringing up her two children alone with her poor checkout operator salary. Their meeting won't be without trouble, since besides material difficulties, both of them are wounded by life. They have to learn how to be happy again.
